decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1099-01-00; 1099-01-01; 1099-01-02; 1099-01-03; 1099-01-04; 1099-01-05; 1099-01-06; 1099-01-07; 1099-01-08; 1099-01-09; 1099-01-10; 1099-02-01; 1099-02-03; 1099-02-04; 1099-02-05; 1099-02-08; 1099-02-09; 1099-02-10; Unnumbered Design and Access Statement (June 2017); Unnumbered Flood Risk Assessment. (June 2017). Received: 14/06/2017.
1099-02-02; 1099-02-06; 1099-02-07. Received: 22/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the flank walls shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - The glazed balcony panels installed to the northern and southern sides of the balcony areas at first and second floor level shall be obscure and installed prior to the occupation of the building as a single family dwelling and shall not be replaced or repaired otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 7 - The refurbishment to the existing driveway hereby approved shall be undertake in a manner to ensure that either:
a)	The hard surface materials used are made of porous materials, or;
b)	Provision is made to direct run-off water from the hard surface to a permeable or porous area or surface within the curtilage of the house.
Development shall be carried out in accordance with these requirements unless agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - The proposed development shall be carried out in accordance with the details contained within the submitted flood risk assessment dated June 2017 unless agreed otherwise in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Refurbishment of the driveway, installation of four front and two rear roof windows, replacement and alterations of existing windows and doors, replacement of balustrades to the rear of the property
